tips: [Unknown Skies] The unique conditions of acid and toxic worlds can occasionally result in the formation of special chemical crystals which can be turned into jewellery and other luxury items.
[Unknown Skies] Who knows what unique and exotic planets lie beyond the Core Worlds...
[Unknown Skies] Some planets have unique characteristics or structures that can ease colony development.
[Unknown Skies] While desert and desertic worlds may seem identical at first glance, the former often tend to be habitable unlike the latter.
[Unknown Skies] While the main source of food for archipelago worlds comes from aquaculture, the patches of farmland found on the various islands can still be utilized to boost production.
